item.description:
Join us for for a day trip to New Bedford to experience a little bit of Portuguese culture, right here in Massachusetts.

The trip will include the following: Portuguese pastry shop visit, shopping at Portuguese stores (i.e. groceries, ceramics, embroidery, jewelry, wine, beer, etc.), visiting Madeiran Portuguese museum and finally dinner at a local Portuguese restaurant.

 

Car pooling is encouraged, but not mandatory.

 

We will be meeting at Lydia's Bakery in New Bedford for some pastries, cakes, espresso and even freshly baked breads and codfish cakes, "bolos de bacalhau" at 2pm.

 

Dinner will be here:  The Royal Grille

 

http://www.theroyalgrille.com/menu.htm#nogo

 

 

Join us for part of the day or spend the day/evening.

 

Hope you can make it!

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Day Trip to Portugal via New Bedford
